channel.title: Software-Engineering on Leonardo Benicio
channel.description: Recent content in Software-Engineering on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
item.description: Guidelines and principles for writing readable, maintainable, and testable code.

item.title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
item.description: Seminal catalog of software design patterns for building flexible, reusable object-oriented systems.

item.title: Software Engineering (10th ed.)
item.description: A broad overview of software engineering principles, processes, and management.

item.title: The Pragmatic Programmer (20th Anniversary ed.)
item.description: Timeless advice on becoming an effective, pragmatic software developer.
